attributes.action: Abolish the failed policy of Multiculturalism, in favour of creating a stronger National Identity for all people
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Multiculturalism has lead Britain to become a nation divided, where different races and faiths feel cut off from mainstream society, and which has lead to a dangerous rise in young Islamic militancy. We urge the Government to abandon such policies before we have civil unrest in this country, in favour of promoting a shared sense of Britishness amongst all people.
